info.description: This is the documentation for Kurozora API.
info.title: Kurozora API

get.description: Plain API JSON response.
This endpoint will retrieve the details to for the explore page.

parameters.name: genre_id
parameters.description: ID of the genre to filter on.

post.summary: Register a new user
post.description: This endpoint will create a new user based on the given details.

post.summary: Register a new user (sign in with Apple)
post.description: This endpoint will create a new user using Sign in with Apple.

platform.description: The platform that was used to create the session

platform_version.description: The platform version that was used to create the session

device_vendor.description: The device vendor that was used to create the session

device_model.description: The device model that was used to create the session

post.summary: Log a user in via SIWA (sign in with Apple)
post.description: This endpoint will log a user in using Sign in with Apple.

identity_token.description: The identity token (JWT) as provided by Apple

platform.description: The platform that was used to create the session

platform_version.description: The platform version that was used to create the session

device_vendor.description: The device vendor that was used to create the session

device_model.description: The device model that was used to create the session

post.summary: Request a password reset for a user
post.description: This endpoint will send an email to the user to reset their password.

email.description: The email of the user to request a password reset.

get.summary: Get a list of the user's sessions
get.description: This endpoint will retrieve a list of sessions for the user.

get.summary: Get an overview of the user's Anime library
get.description: This endpoint will retrieve the list of Anime in a user's library.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The status to retrieve the library items for.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Available sorting options:
- title(asc/desc)
- age(newest/oldest)
- rating(worst/best)
- my-rating(worst/best)

post.summary: Add an Anime to the user's Anime library
post.description: This endpoint will add to the list of Anime in a user's library.

anime_id.description: The ID of the Anime to add.

status.description: The watch status to assign to the Anime.

post.summary: Remove an Anime from the user's Anime library
post.description: This endpoint will remove from the list of Anime in a user's library.

anime_id.description: The ID of the Anime to remove.

post.summary: Import a MAL export file into the user's library
post.description: This endpoint will import a MAL export file into the user's library.

behavior.description: The behavior to use while processing the import request.

get.description: This endpoint will retrieve the search results of Anime in the user's library.

get.summary: Get an overview of the user's favorite Anime
get.description: This endpoint will retrieve the list of Anime in the user's favorites list.

post.summary: Add or remove an Anime to the user's Anime favorites
post.description: This endpoint will add or remove to the list of Anime in a user's favorites.

anime_id.description: The ID of the Anime to add.

is_favorite.description:
Whether to add or remove the anime.
- 0 = remove
- 1 = add

get.description: This endpoint will retrieve the details of a user's profile.

post.summary: Updates a user's profile information
post.description:
This endpoint will update a user's profile information.

WARNING: You should only send the request body parameters that actually need to be changed!

get.description: This endpoint will retrieve the details of the current user's profile.
This endpoint will retrieve the list of a user's notifications.

This endpoint will retrieve the search results for users.

TIP: You can prefix your search with "id:" to search for a user with a specific ID.

post.summary: Follow or unfollow another user
post.description: This endpoint will follow or unfollow another user.

follow.description:
Whether to follow or unfollow the user.
- 0 = unfollow
- 1 = follow

get.summary: Retrieve the user's list of followers.
get.description: This endpoint will retrieve the user's list of followers.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page to retrieve followers from. (starts at 1)

get.summary: Retrieve the user's list of following users.
get.description: This endpoint will retrieve the user's list of following users.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page to retrieve followers from. (starts at 1)

get.summary: Gets the details of a notification
get.description: This endpoint will retrieve the details of a notification.

parameters.name: notificationUUID
parameters.description: UUID of the notification to be retrieved.

post.summary: Deletes a notification from the database
post.description: This endpoint will delete a user's notification.

parameters.name: notificationUUID
parameters.description: UUID of the notification to be deleted.

post.summary: Update a single, multiple or all notifications' status
post.description: This endpoint will update the status of a single, multiple or all notifications.

notification.description: The UUID of the notification to update. Use "all" to update all of the user's notifications.

read.description:
Mark notification(s) as read or unread.
- 0 = unread
- 1 = read

get.description: This endpoint will retrieve the details of an Anime item.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description:
The relations to include in the response. Available relations are:
- actors
- characters
- cast
- relations
- seasons

get.description: This endpoint will retrieve the actors of an Anime item.
This endpoint will retrieve the characters of an Anime item.
This endpoint will retrieve the actor-characters of an Anime item.
This endpoint will retrieve the relations of an Anime item.
This endpoint will retrieve the seasons of an Anime item.

post.summary: Rate an Anime.
post.description: This endpoint will allow user's to leave a rating for an Anime.

get.description:
This endpoint will retrieve the search results for Anime.

TIP: You can prefix your search with "id:" to search for Anime with a specific ID.
This endpoint will retrieve the forum sections.
This endpoint will retrieve the details for a forum section.
This endpoint will retrieve the threads in a forum section.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The method of ordering the threads.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page to retrieve threads from. (starts at 1)

post.summary: Submit a new thread to a section.
post.description: This endpoint will submit a new thread.

get.description: This endpoint will retrieve the actors.
This endpoint will retrieve the details for a actor.
This endpoint will retrieve the details of a specific season.
This endpoint will retrieve the episodes in a certain season.

post.summary: Marks an episode as "watched" or "not watched".
post.description: This endpoint will updated the watched status for an episode.

watched.description:
Mark episode watched or not.
- -1 = not watched
- 1 = watched

get.description: This endpoint will retrieve the characters.
This endpoint will retrieve the details of a specific character.
This endpoint will retrieve the genres.
This endpoint will retrieve the details of a specific genre.
This endpoint will retrieve the details for a forum thread.

post.summary: Leaves a vote for a thread.
post.description: This endpoint will leave a vote for a thread.

get.summary: (optional authentication) Gets the replies on a thread.
get.description: This endpoint will retrieve the replies on a thread.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The method of ordering the results.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page to retrieve replies from.

post.summary: Leaves a reply on a thread.
post.description: This endpoint will leave a reply on a thread.

get.description:
This endpoint will retrieve the search results for forum threads.

TIP: You can prefix your search with "id:" to search for Anime with a specific ID.

post.summary: [MOD+] Lock or unlock a thread.
post.description:
MOD+

This endpoint will lock or unlock a thread.

post.summary: Leaves a vote for a forum reply.
post.description: This endpoint will leave a vote for a forum reply.

post.summary: Create a new session (login)
post.description: This endpoint will create a new session for a user.

platform.description: The platform that was used to create the session

platform_version.description: The platform version that was used to create the session

device_vendor.description: The device vendor that was used to create the session

device_model.description: The device model that was used to create the session

get.summary: Gets the details of a session
get.description: This endpoint will retrieve the details of a session.

parameters.name: sessionID
parameters.description: ID of the session to be retrieved.

post.summary: Updates the information of a session
post.description: This endpoint will update the information of a sessions.

apn_device_token.description: The new APN device token for the session.

parameters.name: sessionID
parameters.description: ID of the session to be updated.

post.summary: Deletes a session
post.description: This endpoint will delete a session.

parameters.name: sessionID
parameters.description: ID of the session to be deleted.

get.description: This endpoint will retrieve the studios.
This endpoint will retrieve the details of a specific studio.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: The relations to include in the response. Available relations are: anime

get.description: This endpoint will retrieve the anime details for a studio.
This endpoint will retrieve an overview of themes.
This endpoint will retrieve the latest privacy policy.

ForumSortType.description:
The set of available forum sort types.
- top: sorted by the most liked resource at the top.
- recent: sorted by the newly created resource at the top.

VoteType.description:
The vote type to submit. Submitting the same vote type twice will undo the vote.
- -1 = dislike
- 1 = like

EpisodeWatchStatus.description:
The set of available watch status types.
- -1 = not watched
- 1 = watched

KurozoraLibraryStatus.description: The set of available library status types.

MALImportBehavior.description: The set of available MAL import behavior types.

GetForumThreadsDetails.description: Successful GET Forum-Threads Details JSON response.
